A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is without doubt a great addition to the star wars saga. \nBut it is not going to go the way you think. Rian Johnson has created a  film that flies by so fast with moments that are up there with some of the best star wars moments ever. The stand out is Mark Hamill as Luke skywalker who undoubtedly gives his career best performance as the conflicted Master Jedi. Some people may hate some of the choices Rian Johnson has put into this film. However I thought it was bold and unlike any star wars we have previously seen. I recommend repeat viewings because there is so much to take in the first time around.\nThe force is strong with this one....
